response.explain: The error "name 'garlic_clove_209' is not defined" indicates that the object 'garlic_clove_209' was not registered before it was used in the action code. The object needs to be registered first before it can be used in the action code.
response.subtask:
(1) Open the fridge
(2) Take out the garlic clove
(3) Cook the garlic clove
(4) Take out the butter
(5) Put the cooked garlic clove and butter on the plate
response.code:
def act(robot,env,camera):
    # Subtask 3: Cook the garlic clove
    stove = registry(env,"stove_igwqpj_0")
    garlic_clove_209 = registry(env,"garlic_clove_209")
    MoveBot(env, robot, stove, camera)
    donothing(env)
    cook(robot, garlic_clove_209)
    donothing(env)
